general_info.summary: This document outlines various aspects of Sharda University's operations and offerings for the 2025-26 program year. It lists different schools, including Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, and Nursing Science & Research. Key administrative and academic functions are mentioned, such as Examination Annual Reports, Academic Bank of Credits, Curricula Feedback, and University Brochures. The text also highlights student support services like career counseling, skill enhancement initiatives, and family/couple counseling. It includes information on university structure, leadership, history, tenders, and legal frameworks, alongside specific programs like FM Radio, visa guidelines, and observerships. Additionally, it touches upon external relations with recruiters and international campuses, as well as academic resources and specific courses.
